name: Paper Dragon
description:
When you try to fold an origami pattern from memory after not practicing it in so long it becomes almost like a puzzle. The only pieces you have are vague memories of certain folds you made and what the pattern looked like at certain states. While it can be frustrating due to many failures, when you finally piece together a pattern from memory its quite satisfying. 

This was made as an assignment for class.

Dragon patterns describes in this game belongs to Jo Nakashima. I recommend his tutorials if you want to try learning origami.
